pymitv

A Python 3 module for controlling Xiaomi TVs

Get started

1

Install using pip

To install, open your command line and pop in the following: pip install pymitv.

2

Start using

To start using, look at the example above or look at the documentation.

Documentation

Installation

Installing is dummy simple. Just use pip: 

pip install pymitv

Or if you have more than one Python version (it happens in this day and age): 

python3 -m pip install pymitv
Remember to replace python3 with whatever you have on your system.
